title: LTB: T206 PSA 2 or above. Portrait only.
author: jpwinn

posts.post_title: LTB: T206 PSA 2 or above. Portrait only.
posts.post_content:
Hi everybody, 

Looking to buy a few t206 portrait cards graded by PSA with a 2 or better. Probably looking for more common cards, nothing too rare. Just trying to build my collection up. 

Postage would be to the UK but I will of course cover full costs etc. 

Can pay by PayPal F&F or G&S and add 3%.

Many thanks
Joe

Hi Joe. I have this one available. Not a common by any means, but its a 2.5 portrait which fits some of your criteria mentioned :)

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/3-2-count/cards-for-sale/85193/t206-ty-cobb-front[/IMG] [IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/3-2-count/cards-for-sale/85194/t206-ty-cobb-reverse[/IMG]
Wow!! That is a beauty. Out of my price range at the moment unfortunately but I appreciate the reply.
